body_html: @yaroslavvb Ok, so I finally compiled tensorflow in another machine. How can I install it in the server without internet access? I tried copying the whole repository with the compiled files, but it still searches pypi for some packages when I run python setup.py develop.
body_text: @yaroslavvb Ok, so I finally compiled tensorflow in another machine. How can I install it in the server without internet access? I tried copying the whole repository with the compiled files, but it still searches pypi for some packages when I run python setup.py develop.
body: @yaroslavvb Ok, so I finally compiled tensorflow in another machine. How can I install it in the server without internet access? I tried copying the whole repository with the compiled files, but it still searches pypi for some packages when I run `python setup.py develop`.
